prompts: Create a powerful rock-type Pokemon with a tough exterior and a gentle heart.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, ideal for mountainous terrains.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sturdy body and a playful attitude, perfect for battles.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in rugged landscapes, showcasing its adventurous spirit.
Show me a Pokemon with rough skin and a strong sense of loyalty to its trainer.
Give me a creature that resembles a dinosaur, with rocky features and a fierce demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that can charge through obstacles with its robust body and fierce determination.
